scripts.build: pnpm run build:shared && pnpm run build:systems
scripts.build:systems: cd packages/system-01 && pnpm run build && cd ../system-02 && pnpm run build
scripts.build:all: pnpm run build:shared && pnpm run build:systems
scripts.storybook: pnpm run build:shared && cd packages/storybook && pnpm run storybook
scripts.storybook:build: pnpm run build:all && cd packages/storybook && pnpm run build-storybook
scripts.storybook:dev: concurrently "pnpm run dev:shared" "cd packages/storybook && pnpm run storybook:dev"
scripts.fresh:install: pnpm run clean:simple && pnpm install && pnpm run build:shared
scripts.clean:deps: rm -rf node_modules packages/*/node_modules packages/*/.turbo && pnpm store prune
scripts.publish:shared: cd packages/shared && pnpm run build && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:system-01: cd packages/system-01 && pnpm run build && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:system-02: cd packages/system-02 && pnpm run build && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:all: pnpm run publish:shared && pnpm run publish:system-01 && pnpm run publish:system-02
scripts.version:patch: pnpm version patch --workspace-root && cd packages/shared && npm version patch && cd ../system-01 && npm version patch && cd ../system-02 && npm version patch
scripts.version:minor: pnpm version minor --workspace-root && cd packages/shared && npm version minor && cd ../system-01 && npm version minor && cd ../system-02 && npm version minor
scripts.version:major: pnpm version major --workspace-root && cd packages/shared && npm version major && cd ../system-01 && npm version major && cd ../system-02 && npm version major
scripts.pack:all: pnpm run pack:shared && pnpm run pack:system-01 && pnpm run pack:system-02
